title: Where To Get Christmas Cake From
abstract: Here's where to buy Christmas cake from in Colombo this December!
content:
Christmas without christmas cakes is like December without Christmas - unacceptable and improbable. Nice, fruity and boozy, christmas cakes are the perfectly festive way to eat your alcohol! And if you're too lazy to make it, here's where you can get your christmas cake fix from.
